mapper.select:
select
t1.id id, t1.phoneNumber phoneNumber, t1.points points
from jacg_integrate t1
left join zmj_report t2 on t1.reportId = t2.id

select
t1.id id, t1.phoneNumber phoneNumber, t1.points points
from jacg_integrate t1
left join zmj_report t2 on t1.reportId = t2.id
where t1.id = #{id}
